name: The Legend of Banjo-Kazooie: The Bear Waker
overview: -King of Red Lions is waiting for Link to go in search of her sister and defeat the evil Ganondorf, but it seems he is delaying and for some strange reason the door of his house is locked. So Banjo and Kazooie should like to explore Outset Island in search of clues to be able to find a way to open the door of his house and find out what could have happened...
